result.ga: Bhí sé ag cur fearthainne aréir
result.orig: Bhí sé ag cur fearthainne aréir
result.html: Bhí sé ag cur fearthainne aréirIt rained last night.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé ag cur fearṫainne aréirIt rained last night.

result.eng: It was wet/It rained a lot.
result.html: Bhí sé fliuchIt was wet/It rained a lot.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé fliuċIt was wet/It rained a lot.
